attributes.action: A plea to ban goldfish as fair ground prizes
attributes.additional_details:
i want to make a difference and change their lives for the better. 
Another benefit of this law would be the life education of children, helping them grow with the mind set of all animals deserve to be treated with respect. They have feelings just like we do, and we would not treat a person like that, therefore we should never treat any living being that way. This change could in turn mould young peoples perceptions for the better.
Please help by signing this petition.
attributes.background:
There are so many benefits which would arise from this being an enforced law.
The biggest of which being the welfare of these animals, which are kept in terrible confined spaces. 
These poor animals need a voice, i am here to give them that,
